variables.input:
fetch dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace
| filter matchesPhrase(contains[dt.entity.service], "SERVICE")
| fields entity.name
| filterOut entity.name == "dynatrace"
| summarize distinctTags = collectDistinct(entity.name)
| fields distinctTags = arraySort(distinctTags, direction: "ascending")

fetch dt.entity.service
| filter isNotNull(belongs_to[dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace])
| fields id, entity.name, dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace = belongs_to[dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace]
| expand dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace
| fields service = entity.name, 
         namespace = entityName(dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace)
| filter in(namespace, $K8sNamespace)
| filterOut matchesPhrase(service, "background threads") or
            matchesPhrase(service, "Health")
| sort service asc
| summarize distinctServices = collectDistinct(service)
| fields distinctServices = arraySort(distinctServices, direction: "ascending")
| fields values = arrayRemoveNulls(array("ALL", distinctServices))

fetch spans
| filter request.is_root_span == TRUE
| filter isNotNull(k8s.namespace.name)
| filter in(k8s.namespace.name, $K8sNamespace)
| filter in($Service, "ALL") OR in(entityName(dt.entity.service), $Service)
| filterOut matchesPhrase(entityName(dt.entity.service), "background threads") or
            matchesPhrase(entityName(dt.entity.service), "Health")
| fields endpoint.name
| summarize distinctRequests = collectDistinct(endpoint.name)
| fields distinctRequests = arraySort(distinctRequests, direction: "ascending")
| fields values = arrayRemoveNulls(array("ALL", distinctRequests))

10.title: Requests  --> Analysis Type = $AnalysisType
10.query:
fetch spans
| filter request.is_root_span == TRUE
| filter isNotNull(k8s.namespace.name)
| filter in(k8s.namespace.name, $K8sNamespace)
| filter in($Service, "ALL") OR in(entityName(dt.entity.service), $Service)
| filterOut matchesPhrase(entityName(dt.entity.service), "background threads") or
            matchesPhrase(entityName(dt.entity.service), "Health")
| filter in($Request, "ALL") OR in(endpoint.name, $Request)

| fieldsAdd SlowRequestVar = if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "ALL"), toDuration(0),                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "5s"), toDuration(5000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "10s"), toDuration(10000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "15s"), toDuration(15000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "30s"), toDuration(30000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "45s"), toDuration(45000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "1m"), toDuration(60000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "5m"), toDuration(300000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "30m"), toDuration(1800000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "1hr"), toDuration(3600000000000)))))))))))
| fieldsAdd slowRequest = if(duration > SlowRequestVar, "SlowRequest")
| fieldsAdd eventname = span.events[0][span_event.name]
| fieldsAdd all = if(isNotNull(request.is_root_span), "ALL")
| fieldsAdd failed = if(request.is_failed == true,"Failed")
| fieldsAdd exception = if(eventname == "exception", "Exception")
| fieldsAdd http4xx = if(http.response.status_code >= 400 and http.response.status_code<=499 ,"HTTP4xx")
| fieldsAdd http5xx = if(http.response.status_code >= 500 and http.response.status_code<=599 ,"HTTP5xx")
| filter $AnalysisType == all or 
         $AnalysisType == slowRequest or 
         $AnalysisType == failed or 
         $AnalysisType == exception or 
         $AnalysisType == http4xx or
         $AnalysisType == http5xx
| summarize  count = count(), 
             by: {service = entityName(dt.entity.service),
                  request = endpoint.name}
| sort count desc
| fields count, 
         request,
         service
| limit 10

11.title: Latency  --> Analysis Type = $AnalysisType
11.query:
fetch spans
| filter request.is_root_span == TRUE
| filter isNotNull(k8s.namespace.name)
| filter in(k8s.namespace.name, $K8sNamespace)
| filter in($Service, "ALL") OR in(entityName(dt.entity.service), $Service)
| filterOut matchesPhrase(entityName(dt.entity.service), "background threads") or
            matchesPhrase(entityName(dt.entity.service), "Health")
| filter in($Request, "ALL") OR in(endpoint.name, $Request)

| fieldsAdd SlowRequestVar = if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "ALL"), toDuration(0),                     
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "5s"), toDuration(5000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "10s"), toDuration(10000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "15s"), toDuration(15000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "30s"), toDuration(30000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "45s"), toDuration(45000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "1m"), toDuration(60000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "5m"), toDuration(300000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "30m"), toDuration(1800000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "1hr"), toDuration(3600000000000)))))))))))
| fieldsAdd slowRequest = if(duration > SlowRequestVar, "SlowRequest")
| fieldsAdd eventname = span.events[0][span_event.name]
| fieldsAdd all = if(isNotNull(request.is_root_span), "ALL")
| fieldsAdd failed = if(request.is_failed == true,"Failed")
| fieldsAdd exception = if(eventname == "exception", "Exception")
| fieldsAdd http4xx = if(http.response.status_code >= 400 and http.response.status_code<=499 ,"HTTP4xx")
| fieldsAdd http5xx = if(http.response.status_code >= 500 and http.response.status_code<=599 ,"HTTP5xx")
| filter $AnalysisType == all or 
         $AnalysisType == slowRequest or 
         $AnalysisType == failed or 
         $AnalysisType == exception or 
         $AnalysisType == http4xx or
         $AnalysisType == http5xx
| summarize count = count(), 
            latency = median(duration), 
            by: {service = entityName(dt.entity.service),
                 request = endpoint.name}
| sort latency desc
| fields latency, 
         request,
         service,
         count
| limit 10

12.title: Failures  --> Analysis Type = $AnalysisType
12.query:
fetch spans
| filter request.is_root_span == true
| filter request.is_failed == true
| filter isNotNull(k8s.namespace.name)
| filter in(k8s.namespace.name, $K8sNamespace)
| filter in($Service, "ALL") OR in(entityName(dt.entity.service), $Service)
| filterOut matchesPhrase(entityName(dt.entity.service), "background threads") or
            matchesPhrase(entityName(dt.entity.service), "Health")
| filter in($Request, "ALL") OR in(endpoint.name, $Request)
| fieldsAdd SlowRequestVar = if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "ALL"), toDuration(0),                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "5s"), toDuration(5000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "10s"), toDuration(10000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "15s"), toDuration(15000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "30s"), toDuration(30000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "45s"), toDuration(45000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "1m"), toDuration(60000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "5m"), toDuration(300000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "30m"), toDuration(1800000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "1hr"), toDuration(3600000000000)))))))))))
| fieldsAdd slowRequest = if(duration > SlowRequestVar, "SlowRequest")
| fieldsAdd eventname = span.events[0][span_event.name]
| fieldsAdd all = if(isNotNull(request.is_root_span), "ALL")
| fieldsAdd failed = if(request.is_failed == true,"Failed")
| fieldsAdd exception = if(eventname == "exception", "Exception")
| fieldsAdd http4xx = if(http.response.status_code >= 400 and http.response.status_code<=499 ,"HTTP4xx")
| fieldsAdd http5xx = if(http.response.status_code >= 500 and http.response.status_code<=599 ,"HTTP5xx")
| filter $AnalysisType == all or 
         $AnalysisType == slowRequest or 
         $AnalysisType == failed or 
         $AnalysisType == exception or 
         $AnalysisType == http4xx or
         $AnalysisType == http5xx
| summarize  count = count(),
             by: {service = entityName(dt.entity.service),
                  request = endpoint.name, 
                  status.code = http.response.status_code}
| sort count desc
| fields count,
         request,
         status.code,
         service
| limit 10

13.title: Latency   --> Analysis Type = $AnalysisType
13.query:
fetch spans
| filter request.is_root_span == TRUE
| filter isNotNull(k8s.namespace.name)
| filter in(k8s.namespace.name, $K8sNamespace)
| filter in($Service, "ALL") OR in(entityName(dt.entity.service), $Service)
| filterOut matchesPhrase(entityName(dt.entity.service), "background threads") or
            matchesPhrase(entityName(dt.entity.service), "Health")
| filter in($Request, "ALL") OR in(endpoint.name, $Request)

| fieldsAdd SlowRequestVar = if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "ALL"), toDuration(0),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "5s"), toDuration(5000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "10s"), toDuration(10000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "15s"), toDuration(15000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "30s"), toDuration(30000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "45s"), toDuration(45000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "1m"), toDuration(60000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "5m"), toDuration(300000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "30m"), toDuration(1800000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "1hr"), toDuration(3600000000000)))))))))))
| fieldsAdd slowRequest = if(duration > SlowRequestVar, "SlowRequest")
| fieldsAdd eventname = span.events[0][span_event.name]
| fieldsAdd all = if(isNotNull(request.is_root_span), "ALL")
| fieldsAdd failed = if(request.is_failed == true,"Failed")
| fieldsAdd exception = if(eventname == "exception", "Exception")
| fieldsAdd http4xx = if(http.response.status_code >= 400 and http.response.status_code<=499 ,"HTTP4xx")
| fieldsAdd http5xx = if(http.response.status_code >= 500 and http.response.status_code<=599 ,"HTTP5xx")
| filter $AnalysisType == all or 
         $AnalysisType == slowRequest or 
         $AnalysisType == failed or 
         $AnalysisType == exception or 
         $AnalysisType == http4xx or
         $AnalysisType == http5xx
| makeTimeseries latency = median(duration),
                 by: {service = entityName(dt.entity.service),
                     request = endpoint.name}
| sort latency

18.title: Exceptions  --> Analysis Type = $AnalysisType
18.query:
fetch spans
| filter request.is_root_span == TRUE
| filter isNotNull(k8s.namespace.name) 
| filter in(k8s.namespace.name, $K8sNamespace)
| filter in($Service, "ALL") OR in(entityName(dt.entity.service), $Service)
| filterOut matchesPhrase(entityName(dt.entity.service), "background threads") or
            matchesPhrase(entityName(dt.entity.service), "Health")
| filter in($Request, "ALL") OR in(endpoint.name, $Request)
| fieldsAdd SlowRequestVar = if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "ALL"), toDuration(0),                     
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "5s"), toDuration(5000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "10s"), toDuration(10000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "15s"), toDuration(15000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "30s"), toDuration(30000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "45s"), toDuration(45000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "1m"), toDuration(60000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "5m"), toDuration(300000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "30m"), toDuration(1800000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "1hr"), toDuration(3600000000000)))))))))))
| fieldsAdd slowRequest = if(duration > SlowRequestVar, "SlowRequest")
| fieldsAdd eventname = span.events[0][span_event.name]
| fieldsAdd all = if(isNotNull(request.is_root_span), "ALL")
| fieldsAdd failed = if(request.is_failed == true,"Failed")
| fieldsAdd http4xx = if(http.response.status_code >= 400 and http.response.status_code<=499 ,"HTTP4xx")
| fieldsAdd http5xx = if(http.response.status_code >= 500 and http.response.status_code<=599 ,"HTTP5xx")
| fieldsAdd exception = if(eventname == "exception", "Exception")
| fieldsAdd exception.message = span.events[0][exception.message]
| fieldsAdd exception.class = span.events[0][exception.type]
| fieldsAdd eventname = span.events[0][span_event.name]
| filter eventname == "exception"
| filter $AnalysisType == all or 
         $AnalysisType == slowRequest or 
         $AnalysisType == failed or 
         $AnalysisType == exception or 
         $AnalysisType == http4xx or
         $AnalysisType == http5xx
| summarize count = count(), by:{service = entityName(dt.entity.service),
                                 request = endpoint.name, 
                                 class = exception.class, 
                                 message = exception.message}
| sort count desc
| fields count,
         request,
         message,   
         class,
         service
| limit 10

20.title: Analysis Type = $AnalysisType
20.query:
fetch spans
| filter request.is_root_span == TRUE
| filter isNotNull(k8s.namespace.name)
| filter in(k8s.namespace.name, $K8sNamespace)
| filter in($Service, "ALL") OR in(entityName(dt.entity.service), $Service)
| filterOut matchesPhrase(entityName(dt.entity.service), "background threads") or
            matchesPhrase(entityName(dt.entity.service), "Health")
| filter in($Request, "ALL") OR in(endpoint.name, $Request)

| fieldsAdd SlowRequestVar = if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "ALL"), toDuration(0),                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "5s"), toDuration(5000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "10s"), toDuration(10000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "15s"), toDuration(15000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "30s"), toDuration(30000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "45s"), toDuration(45000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "1m"), toDuration(60000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "5m"), toDuration(300000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "30m"), toDuration(1800000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "1hr"), toDuration(3600000000000)))))))))))


| fieldsAdd slowRequest = if(duration > SlowRequestVar, "SlowRequest")
| fieldsAdd eventname = span.events[0][span_event.name]
| fieldsAdd all = if(isNotNull(request.is_root_span), "ALL")
| fieldsAdd failed = if(request.is_failed == true,"Failed")
| fieldsAdd exception = if(eventname == "exception", "Exception")
| fieldsAdd http4xx = if(http.response.status_code >= 400 and http.response.status_code<=499 ,"HTTP4xx")
| fieldsAdd http5xx = if(http.response.status_code >= 500 and http.response.status_code<=599 ,"HTTP5xx")
| filter $AnalysisType == all or 
         $AnalysisType == slowRequest or 
         $AnalysisType == failed or 
         $AnalysisType == exception or 
         $AnalysisType == http4xx or
         $AnalysisType == http5xx

| fieldsAdd exception.message = span.events[0][exception.message]
| fieldsAdd exception.class = span.events[0][exception.type]
| fieldsAdd eventname = span.events[0][span_event.name]
| fieldsAdd method = if(isNotNull(http.request.method), http.request.method, else: "gRPC")
| fieldsAdd grpcError = if(rpc.protocol == "grpc", span.events[][exception.message])
| parse dt.internal.failure_detection_verdict, "DATA 'ExceptionClass: ' LD:exceptionClass PUNCT"
| parse toString(grpcError), "DATA 'rpc error: code = Code(' INT:grpcErrorCode ')'"
| fieldsAdd status.code = if(isNotNull(http.response.status_code),http.response.status_code, 
                          else:if(grpcErrorCode > 0, grpcErrorCode, 
                          else:if(isNotNull(exceptionClass),exceptionClass,
                          else:grpcError)))
| sort timestamp desc
| fieldsAdd analysisType = $AnalysisType

| fields  analysisType = if(analysisType == "ALL", "ğŸŒ ALL",
                         else:if(analysisType == "SlowRequest", " ğŸ“ˆ SlowRequest",
                         else:if(analysisType == "Failed", "âŒ Failed",
                         else:if(analysisType == "Exception", "â—ï¸Exception",
                         else:if(analysisType == "HTTP4xx", "ğŸŸ  HTTP4xx",
                         else:if(analysisType == "HTTP5xx", "ğŸ”´ HTTP5xx"
                         )))))),
         start_time,
         service = entityName(dt.entity.service),
         request = endpoint.name, 
         method,
         status.code,
         exception.message = if(isNotNull(exception.message), exception.message, else:"No Exception"),
         duration,
         trace.id
| limit 1000

22.title: Exceptions  --> Analysis Type = $AnalysisType
22.query:
fetch spans
| filter request.is_root_span == TRUE
| filter isNotNull(k8s.namespace.name) 
| filter in(k8s.namespace.name, $K8sNamespace)
| filter in($Service, "ALL") OR in(entityName(dt.entity.service), $Service)
| filterOut matchesPhrase(entityName(dt.entity.service), "background threads") or
            matchesPhrase(entityName(dt.entity.service), "Health")
| filter in($Request, "ALL") OR in(endpoint.name, $Request)
| fieldsAdd SlowRequestVar = if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "ALL"), toDuration(0),                     
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "5s"), toDuration(5000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "10s"), toDuration(10000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "15s"), toDuration(15000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "30s"), toDuration(30000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "45s"), toDuration(45000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "1m"), toDuration(60000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "5m"), toDuration(300000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "30m"), toDuration(1800000000000),
                     else:if(($SlowRequestTheshold == "1hr"), toDuration(3600000000000)))))))))))
| fieldsAdd slowRequest = if(duration > SlowRequestVar, "SlowRequest")
| fieldsAdd eventname = span.events[0][span_event.name]
| fieldsAdd all = if(isNotNull(request.is_root_span), "ALL")
| fieldsAdd failed = if(request.is_failed == true,"Failed")
| fieldsAdd http4xx = if(http.response.status_code >= 400 and http.response.status_code<=499 ,"HTTP4xx")
| fieldsAdd http5xx = if(http.response.status_code >= 500 and http.response.status_code<=599 ,"HTTP5xx")
| fieldsAdd exception = if(eventname == "exception", "Exception")
| fieldsAdd exception.message = span.events[0][exception.message]
| fieldsAdd exception.class = span.events[0][exception.type]
| fieldsAdd eventname = span.events[0][span_event.name]
| filter eventname == "exception"
| filter $AnalysisType == all or 
         $AnalysisType == slowRequest or 
         $AnalysisType == failed or 
         $AnalysisType == exception or 
         $AnalysisType == http4xx or
         $AnalysisType == http5xx
| makeTimeseries count = count(), 
                 by:{service = entityName(dt.entity.service),
                     request = endpoint.name, 
                     class = exception.class, 
                     message = exception.message}

23.title: Process CPU %
23.query:
timeseries cpu = avg(dt.process.cpu.usage), 
           by:{dt.entity.process_group_instance},
           filter:k8s.namespace.name == $K8sNamespace
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance 
         | fields id, serviceId=runs[dt.entity.service], belongs_to], 
         sourceField:dt.entity.process_group_instance, lookupField:id
| filter isNotNull(lookup.serviceId)
| expand lookup.serviceId
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.service 
         | fields id, entity.name], 
         sourceField:lookup.serviceId, lookupField:id
| filter in($Service , "ALL") OR in(lookup.entity.name, $Service)   
| sort cpu desc
| limit 20
| fields timeframe, 
         interval,
         service = lookup.entity.name,
         process = entityName(dt.entity.process_group_instance), 
         cpu

24.title: Process Memory %
24.query:
timeseries memory = avg(dt.process.memory.usage), 
           by:{dt.entity.process_group_instance},
           filter:k8s.namespace.name == $K8sNamespace
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance 
         | fields id, serviceId=runs[dt.entity.service], belongs_to], 
         sourceField:dt.entity.process_group_instance, lookupField:id
| filter isNotNull(lookup.serviceId)
| expand lookup.serviceId
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.service 
         | fields id, entity.name], 
         sourceField:lookup.serviceId, lookupField:id
| filter in($Service , "ALL") OR in(lookup.entity.name, $Service)   
| sort memory desc
| limit 20
| fields timeframe, 
         interval,
         service = lookup.entity.name,
         process = entityName(dt.entity.process_group_instance), 
         memory

25.title: Process Memory Used
25.query:
timeseries memoryUsed = avg(dt.process.memory.working_set_size), 
           by:{dt.entity.process_group_instance},
           filter:k8s.namespace.name == $K8sNamespace
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance 
         | fields id, serviceId=runs[dt.entity.service], belongs_to], 
         sourceField:dt.entity.process_group_instance, lookupField:id
| filter isNotNull(lookup.serviceId)
| expand lookup.serviceId
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.service 
         | fields id, entity.name], 
         sourceField:lookup.serviceId, lookupField:id
| filter in($Service , "ALL") OR in(lookup.entity.name, $Service)   
| sort memoryUsed desc
| limit 20
| fields timeframe, 
         interval, 
         service = lookup.entity.name,
         process = entityName(dt.entity.process_group_instance), 
         memoryUsed

26.title: Garbage collection suspension time
26.query:
timeseries usage = avg(dt.runtime.jvm.gc.suspension_time),
           by:{dt.entity.process_group_instance},
           filter:k8s.namespace.name == $K8sNamespace

| append [timeseries usage = avg(dt.runtime.clr.gc.suspension_time),
           by:{dt.entity.process_group_instance},
           filter:k8s.namespace.name == $K8sNamespace
         ]

| append [timeseries usage = avg(dt.runtime.go.gc.suspension_time),
           by:{dt.entity.process_group_instance},
           filter:k8s.namespace.name == $K8sNamespace
         ]

| append [timeseries usage = avg(dt.runtime.nodejs.gc.suspension_time),
           by:{dt.entity.process_group_instance},
           filter:k8s.namespace.name == $K8sNamespace
         ]

| lookup [fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance 
         | fields id, serviceId=runs[dt.entity.service], belongs_to], 
         sourceField:dt.entity.process_group_instance, lookupField:id
| filter isNotNull(lookup.serviceId)
| expand lookup.serviceId
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.service 
         | fields id, entity.name], 
         sourceField:lookup.serviceId, lookupField:id
| filter in($Service , "ALL") OR in(lookup.entity.name, $Service)   
| sort usage desc
| limit 20
| fields timeframe, 
         interval,
         service = lookup.entity.name,
         process = entityName(dt.entity.process_group_instance), 
         usage

33.content:
## ğŸ’¡ K8s Multi-Dimensional Analysis with Drill down to Distributed Traces
____
